ResearchProjectDef.label: Cabin
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build high density housings with integrated temperature controls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: TSS
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct massive Test Subject Storage facilities that can hold upto 16 pawns. Has integrated automatic temperature controls, nutrient paste autofeeding, blood draw and transfusion options. Also connects to the hygiene network if it's available.

ResearchProjectDef.label: time dilation add-on
ResearchProjectDef.description: Can be built on top of TSS engine. Slows time 2x for TSS occupants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: time freeze add-on
ResearchProjectDef.description: Can be built on top of TSS engine. Completely freezes time for TSS occupants. Like a cryptosleep casket.

ResearchProjectDef.label: time acceleration add-on
ResearchProjectDef.description: Can be built on top of TSS engine. Accelerates time 2x for TSS occupants.
